Package com.github.fabrizio_costabile.backpropagation.network

Class Weights

java.lang.Object
com.github.fabrizio_costabile.backpropagation.network.Weights
public class Weights extends Object
3D matrix of connection weights between neurons

      public Weights(int[] sizesOfLayers)
      Constructs a 3D weight matrix by number of neurons in each layer

      sizesOfLayers - the number neurons of each layer (including input invalid input: '&' output layers)

    • getSize

      public int getSize(int i, int j)
      Get the number of connection weights for a given neuron invalid input: '&' the neuron's layer
      Parameters:
      i - the layer index
      j - the neuron in layer index i
      Returns:
      the number of connection weights for neuron index j in layer index i

    • setWeight

      public void setWeight(int i, int j, int k, double weight)
      Set the connection weight between neuron index j, in layer index i, and neuron index k, in layer index i + 1
      Parameters:
      i - the layer index
      j - the neuron in layer index i
      k - the neuron in layer index i + 1
      weight - the connection weight between neuron index j, in layer index i, and neuron index k, in layer index i + 1

    • getWeight

      public double getWeight(int i, int j, int k)
      Get the connection weight by layer and neurons
      Parameters:
      i - the layer index
      j - the neuron in layer index i
      k - the neuron in layer index i + 1
      Returns:
      the connection weight between neuron index j, in layer index i, and neuron index k, in layer index i + 1
